item.title: NORWAY - A Time-Lapse Adventure
item.description:
NORWAY - A Time-Lapse Adventure

For behind the scenes photos, check out my new Instagram account: morten.rustad www.rustadmedia.com Please watch in HD with good speakers for the optimal experience. You can watch it in 4K here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Scxs7L0vhZ4 This is a time-lapse video resulting from a 15,000 km (almost 10,000 miles) long road trip and tens of thousands of images taken along the way over the last 5 months.
